column2: Atlas Technical Consultants Inc, formerly Boxwood Merger Corp, is a provider of testing, inspection engineering and consulting services. The Company provides a range of technical services, enabling its clients to test, inspect, plan, design, certify and manage a wide variety of projects. It also operates as an advisor, enabling its clients in designing, engineering, inspecting, managing and maintaining civil and commercial infrastructure, servicing existing structures as well as helping to build new structures. The Company provides solutions to public and private sector clients in the transportation, commercial, water, government, education and industrial markets.
13215 Bee Cave Parkway, Building B, Suite 230
